channel.title: Need some help on hitting dummys

item.title: Need some help on hitting dummys
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You wack the dummy's head."); stillgfx(336, absY, absX); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[3]), 3); actionTimer = 12; } bre

i have changed that but it only works for attack not defence or strength. how can i make it work for defence and strength aswell?

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on hitting dummys
